juzs.text: (Kaneka Ibrahima) jwatite: “Abali jao (jine) jaichile nijapi jaomanja akutumidwa?”
Wanganyao watite: “Chisimu uwwe tutumisyidwe ku wandu wakulewa.”
“Kuti tukaatumichisye sakalawe syelongo (lya ku Moto).”
“Syewichidwe chimanyilo kwa Ambuje wenu (Allah) kwawichila akusumba mpika (pasambi).”
Basi ni twaakopwesye wawaliji mwalakwemo mwa akukulupilila
Nambo nganitujisimana mwalakwemo ikaweje nyumba jimpepe ja Asilamu (Lutwi ni wanache wakwe wawili wachikongwe)
Ni twalesile mwalakwemo chilosyo (cha ipotesi jajili mbwani jajiwe) kwa wandu waakuijogopa ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope
Nombe mu (abali ja) Musa (muwele mwana chilosyo cha ipotesi), pandema jatwantumisye kwa Firiauna ni umboni wakuonechela
Basi (Firiauna) jwanyosyisye ligongo lya machili gakwe, ni jwatite: “(Aju ni) nsawi kapena jwamasoka.”
Ni twankwembekenye jwalakwe ni asilikali wakwe ni twaaponyisye m’mbwani, jwalakwe juli jwagambidwa
Nombe mu (abali ja) achina Adi (muwele mwana chilosyo cha ipotesi), pandema jatwatumichisye mbungo (jachimbunga) jakonanga
Nganijichilekaga chindu chilichose chajichipujiile ikaweje kuchitenda mpela chepukuswe
Nombe mu (abali ja) achina Samuda (muwele mwana chilosyo cha ipotesi), pandema jawasalilidwe kuti: “Sengwagani kwakandawi kannono.”
Ni walikwesisye kuleka lilamusi lya M’mbuje gwao (Allah), ni wakwembekenye n’gumilo (wa ipotesi) aku ali nkulola
Ni nganakombola kwima (kuti atile), soni nganawa wanti nikulikulupusya (achimisyene)
Ni (twajonasile) wandu wa Nuhu kalakala (nkanawe wasalidweo), chisimu wanganyao waliji wandu wakunyosya
Sano liwunde twalitawile mwamachili, soni chisimu Uwwe tuwele Wakulisapangula (liwundelyo)
Ni litaka twalitandiche, basi ni Wambone nnope mwa akwasasya (twaliji Uwwe)
Ni mu chindu chilichose tugumbile iwili-iwili (mpela chachilume ni chachikongwe), kuti jenumanja nkumbuchile (ukoto wa Allah)
Basi (mwasalilani yanti): “Tililani kwa Allah, chisimu une (Muhammadi ﷺ) kukwenu ni nkutetela jwakuonechela jwakuuma Kukwakwe.”
“Soni ngasim’biika pamo ni Allah nnungu jwine, chisimu une (Muhammadi ﷺ) kukwenu ni nkutetela jwakuonechela jwakuuma Kukwakwe.”
Iyyoyopeyo (yaakuti pakuntenda mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ kuti nsawi kapena jwamasoka), nganijwaichilileje awala wapaujo pao ntenga jwalijose ikaweje wanganyao watiji: “(Aju ni) nsawi kapena jwamasoka.”
Ana ate kulechelana gele (malowega)? (Ngwamba), nambo wanganyao ni wandu wakusumba mpika (pa ukafili)
Basi mwatundumalilani wanganyao (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ), soni mmwe ngam’ba wagambidwa (nkwatundumalilamo)
Soni kumbusyani, basi chisimu kumbusya tikwakamuchisye wakulupilila
Soni nganingamba gumba majini ni wandu ikaweje kuti angalagatileje Une (Jikape)
Ngangusaka kuumila kukwao lisiki, soni ngangusaka kuti andiisyeeje (kapena kuliisya iwumbe Yangu)
Chisimu Allah ni Nkupeleka lisiki nnope, Nsyene machili gakulimbangana

Sano chisimu akwete kupata awala walitendele lupuso chipande cha ilagasyo chanti mpela chipande chailagasyo cha achimijao (wakala), basi ngasanjanguya (kuti napeje ilagasyoyo ndawi jakwe nkanijikwane)
Basi ipotesi tiyichiwa kwa awala waakufuulu pa lisiku lyao alila lyaakupedwa chilanga (cha kwika kwakwe)
Ngulilumbila litumbi (lyawam’bechetakasyisye Allah Musa lyalili ku Sinayi)
Ni chitabu chachilembeedwe (Qur’an)
Mu ikalakala yepende yewunukulidwe
Ni Al-Bait-ul-Ma‘mur (Nyumba jajili kumawunde mwakulondana ni Likaaba, jaakujijaulilaga Achimalaika mwakuwilinganya)
Ni nsakasa wenyakulidwe (liwunde)
Ni mbwani syegumbasye (mesi)
Chisimu ilagasyo ya Ambuje wenu (Allah) iwele yakupatikana kwene
Pangali jwakuisiwilila
Lisiku lyalichitenganyika liwunde ni ntenganyiko wamachili
Ni gachijenda matumbi ni kajende kaluwilo
Basi ipotesi lyele lisikulyo taachiipata wakanila
Awala waakuwa nkung’anda mu yangali mate
Lisiku lyatachitutilidwa ku moto wa Jahannama katutilidwe kamachili
(Ni tachisalilidwa yanti): “Awu ni Moto awula wamwaliji nkuwukaanila.”
“Ana weleu usawi, kapena jenumanja ngankulola?”
“Ujinjilani (ni kupasya kupoteka kwakwe), pililani kapena nkapilila yalumope kukwenu, chisimu nkulipidwa yamwaliji nkupanganya.”
Chisimu wawoga (wakun’jogopa Allah) tachiwa m’Matimbe ga ku Mbepo, ni chindimba
Achiyisengwelaga yawapele M’mbuje gwao (Allah), aku M’mbuje gwao ali wagosile ku ilagasyo ya Moto Waukali
(Tachasalila kuti): “Lyagani soni mwagani mwakusengwa ligongo lya ayila (yambone) yamwaliji nkutenda.”
Ali ajegeme mu itengu yauchimbichimbi yejalidwe chenene, ni tuchalombekasya ni achimmasyeto wameso gakulanguka soni gekulungwa mwakusalalila

Sano awala waakulupilile ni kwaakuuya wanache wao pa chikulupi, chitukasimanganye wanganyao ni wanache wao, soni ngatuja kwapunguchisya (malipilo ga) masengo gao chilichose. Mundu jwalijose tachiwa uwombosi wakuliombolela ku (yakusakala) yawapanganyisye (pakutawidwa ku Moto)
Ni tukaajonjechesyeje (wakulupililao ndawi ni katema) isogosi kwisa soni nyama, mu yataakaisacheje
Takapochelanganeje kwalakweko ipanda (yankologo) wangatendekasya kuwecheta yangali mate namuno yasambi
Ni taakaasyuunguleje wanganyao achiboyi wao (wakwatumichila), gamba kuwa wanganyao (kamelemende kakwe) nti chisawu ngalekale syesunjidwe
Ni tachigalauchilana wane kwa wane achiwusyanaga (yatite kawupate ntendele wa ku Mbepo)
Tachiti: “Chisimu uwwe twaliji kala ku mawasa getu tuli nkogopa (ipotesi ya Allah).”
“Basi Allah atutendele ukoto uwwe ni atugosile ku ilagasyo ya Moto.”
“Chisimu uwwe twaliji kala (ku duniya) tuli nkum’bomba (Jwele Jikape), chisimu Jwalakwe ni Jwambone nnope, Jwachanasa channope.”
Basi kumbusyani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ), soni mmwe nganim’ba abimbi kapena wamasoka pa chindimba cha Ambuje wenu (champele, wauli utume)
Kapena wanganyao akutiji: “(Jwalakweju ni) nkwiimba ilaanga, tugamba kun’jembechela kuti chimpate chiwa (yachatite pakwapata akwiimba wane waakala)?”
Jilani: “Jembechelaani, chisimu une none ndinamwe mwa akwembecheya.”
Kapena lunda lwao ni lwalukwalamulila yalakweyi, kapena agambile kuwa wandu wakusumba mpika
Kapena akutiji: “Jwalakwe (Muhammadi ﷺ) ni jwaajituunjile (Qur’aniji)?” (Ngwamba), nambo kuti wanganyao ngaakukulupilila
Basi ayiche najo abali janti mpela jalakweji (Qur’an), nawaga jamanjao akuwecheta yakuona
Kapena wagumbidwe mwangali chilichose (chakwagumba), kapena wanganyao ni wawaligumbile (achimisyene)
Kapena wanganyao ni wawagumbile mawunde ni mataka? (Ngwamba), nambo kuti ngakusimichisya (ya ilagasyo ya Allah)
Kapena akwete wanganyao imatiilo ya Ambuje wenu (Allah), kapena wanganyao ni waakwete machili gakutendela yaakusaka
Kapena akwete makwelelo (gakwelela kwinani) ni akupikanilaga pa galakwego (yakuwecheta Achimalaika kwinaniko)? Basi ayiche naotu akupikanila waowo umboni wakuonechela
Kapena Jwalakwe (Allah) ni jukwete wanache wachikongwe, sano jenumanja ni nkwete wanache wachilume
Kapena mmwe (Muhammadi ﷺ) nkwajuga wanganyao malipilo, sano jamanjao ni akusitopelwa nasyo ngongole
Kapena akwete wanganyao (ilimu) yakusisika, basi wanganyao ni akulemba (yalakweyo)
Kapena akusaka kutenda maliindi? Basi awala waakufuulu ni wali wakwaujila malindi gao
Kapena akwete wanganyao nnungu jwine jwangawaga Allah? Aswejele Allah ku yaakum'bwanganya nayo
Namuno angachione chipande cha liwunde chinankugwa (kukwao kwakuli kwika kwa ipotesi), angatite: “(Aga ni) mawunde gawula gagakamatene (ngawa kwika kwa ipotesi).”
Basi mwalekaani, mpaka tasimangane nalyo lisiku lyao alila lyatachikomoka kwa kuwa mu lyalakwelyo
Lisiku lyaangaakamuchisya malindi gao chilichose, soni wanganyao ngasakulupusyidwa
Soni chisimu akwete kupata awala waatesile lupuso (ligongo lya ukafili wao) ilagasyo (ine pa duniya pano) nkaniyiwe yalakweyo (ya ku Akhera), nambo wajinji mwa wanganyao ngakumanyilila

Basi chijembecheyaani mwakupilila (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) chilamusi cha Ambuje wenu (Allah), basi chisimu mmwe nkuloleledwa ni meso Getu, ni lluswejesyeje lumbili lwa Ambuje wenu (Allah) ndema jankwiimuka (kuumila llugono kapena pamalo palipose)
Nombe soni chilo lluswejesyeje (lumbili lwa Ambuje wenu), ni pakutiwila ndondwa (kumasikusiku)
Ngujilumbila ndondwa ndema ja jikutiwila
Nganapotela n’jenuju (Muhammadi ﷺ), soni nganapombotala
Soni ngajukuwecheta ya chisako (chakwe)
Nganigawa galakwego ikaweje malowe gakuuwula gagakuuwulidwa
An’jiganyisye (Qur’anijo Jibulilu) jwamachili gamajinji
Jwajukwete kaoneche kambone. Basi ni jwatamilichiche (pakaoneche kakwe kasyesyene kawan’guumbiile Allah)
Jwalakwe (Jibulilu) juli pachipelela cha meso chamwinani nnope
Kaneka ni jwawandichile (Jibulilu), basi ni konjechesya soni nnope kuwandichila
Ni waliji (uwandikane wao) mpela sikati ja songa siwili sya ukunje, kapena kuwandichila nnope (kupunda pele)
Basi (Allah) ni jwaajuuwiile kwa kapolo Jwakwe (Muhammadi ﷺ) ya jwaajuuwiile (kupitila mwa Jibulilu)
Ntima (wa Muhammadi ﷺ) nganiulambusya pa yajwaiweni (ni meso gakwe)
Ana ni nkukangana najo pa yajukuiona
Soni chisimu (Muhammadi ﷺ) wam’bweni (Jibulilu) ndema jine (chilo cha Al-Mi‘raj)
Pa chitela chansaawu chakupelelapo (indu yakwela kwinani kapena kutuluka pasi, chachili kusyeto kwa mawunde nsano nagawili)
Palakwepo ni pajili Mbepo Jakutamilichikamo
Ndema jayachiunichilaga chitela chansaawucho yayachiunichilaga
Liso (lya Muhammadi ﷺ) nganilisembenduka, soni nganilisumba mpika
Chisimu chene jwalakwe (Muhammadi ﷺ) jwaiweni ilosyo yekulungwa-kulungwa ya Ambuje wakwe (Allah)
Ana mwaweni Al-Lata ni Al-‘Uzza
Kwisa soni Manata jwatatu jwinejo (kuwa milungu jenu mmalo mwa Allah)
Ana jenumanja ni nkwete wanache wachilume, sano Jwalakwe (Allah) ni jukwete wanache wachikongwe
Kwele ni gawanya kwalupuso (kwakuntenda lupuso Allah)

Nganigawatu galakwego ikaweje menape (ga isanamu) gan’gakolasile jenumanja ni achatati wenu, Allah nganatulusya pa yalakweyo umboni uliose (wakundisya kuigalagatila), ngakukuya wanganyao ikaweje liganichisya, ni yayikusaka mitima, kutendaga pamasile pachaichilile kuumila kwa M’mbuje gwao (Allah) chongoko
Kapena mundu mpaka akombole kupata chilichose chaakuchiluumba? (Ngwamba)
Basi Allah ni Nsyene Akhera ni Duniya

Ana soni Achimalaika walingwa kumawunde wangawa nkukamuchisya chondechonde jao chilichose, ikaweje panyuma pakupeleka lusa Allah kwa jwaankunsaka (mwa wanganyao kuti awombe duwa ja chondechonde), ni kunonyelwa najo (nkuwombeledwajo)
Chisimu awala wangakukulupilila ya Akhera akwakolanga Achimalaika ni mena gachikongwe (pakuwecheta kuti wanganyao wanache wachikongwe wa Allah)
Ni nganakola wanganyao pa yalakweyo umanyilisi uliose, ngakukuya ikaweje liganichisya, sano liganichisya lyangakamuchisya chilichose pa yakuona
Basi munnekaani ajula jwaachitundumalile chikumbusyo Chetu (Qur’an), ni ngajukusaka ikaweje umi wa duniya
Chele ni chipelela chao cha umanyilisi. Chisimu Ambuje wenu (Allah) ni waakummanyilila jwaapoteele kuleka litala Lyakwe, nambo soni ni waakummanyilila jwajongweche
Soni Allah ni Nsyene yosope yaili ku mawunde ni yaili petaka, kuti akaalipile awala wasakesye pa yawapanganyisye, ni kwalipila yambone awala waakolosisye (masengo)

Awala waakuliwambasya ilemwa yekulungwa-kulungwa, ni yakunyalaya, ikaweje yamwanamwana. Chisimu Ambuje wenu (Allah) ni Wachikululuko chakusapanguka. Walakwe ni waakummanya chenene jenumanja, kutandila pawan’gumbaga kuumila mwitaka, ni pandema jankuwaaga misigo mu itumbo ya achimama wenu. Basi ngasilliswejesyaga mwachimisyene, Jwalakwe ni Jwaakummanya chenene jwaali ni woga (wakun’jogopa Allah)
Ana mum’bweni (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) ajula jwaagalawiche (kuleka kuunda malamusi ga Allah)
Ni jutosile panandi (mu chipanje chakwe) kaneka ni kuleka (kutolako)
Ana kukwakwe kwana umanyilisi wakusisika, basi jwalakwe ni jukuiona (yanti chipanje chakwecho chichimale ligongo lyakutola)
Ana nganijusalilidwa yaili mu ikalakala ya Musa
Ni Ibrahima ajula juwakwanilisye (chilanga cha Allah)
Yanti jwantwiichile nsigo (wasambi) ngasaja kutwichila nsigo (wasambi) wajwine
Niyanti mundu nganijukola ikaweje yajupanganyisye
Nambo soni kuti masengo gakwe gaachionedwa
Kaneko ni tachilipidwa malipilo gakwana
Ni yanti kwa Ambuje wenu (Allah) ni kuchipelela (kwakuwujila indu yosope)
Ni yanti Jwalakwe (Allah) ni Jwaakutendekaasyaga kuseka ni Jwaakutendekasyaga soni kulila
Ni yanti Jwalakwe (Allah) ni Jwaakupeleka chiwa ni Jwaakupeleka soni umi
Ni yanti Jwalakwe (Allah) ni jwaagumbile mitundu jiwili; chachilume ni chachikongwe
Kuumila mu lindondwa (lya ulume) pati litajidwe (m’chiwelechelo)
Ni yanti kwa Jwalakwe (Allah) kwana guumba kwine (kwakwimusya wawe m’malembe)
Ni yanti Jwalakwe (Allah) ni Jwaakupeleka yakwanila (kuikamulichisya masengo), ni Jwaakupeleka soni yakusalasya
Ni yanti Jwalakwe (Allah) ni M’mbuje jwa ndondwa ja chilimila (jawajigalagatilaga warabu wane)
Ni yanti Jwalakwe (Allah) ni juwajonasile achina Adi wandanda
Ni achina Samuda, ni nganansigasya (ata jumo)
Kwisa soni wandu wa Nuhu kalakala, chisimu wanganyao waliji walupuso nnope, ni wakusumba mpika nnope (pa sambi)
Ni misi jakupitikusyidwa (ja wandu wa Lutwi) wajigwisyisye
Ni yam’bunichiile (misijo) yayam’bunichiile (yaili ilagasyo ya sakalawe syelongo lyejoche ni moto wa Jahannama)
Ana ni chapi mu chindimba cha Ambuje wenu (Allah mmwe amundu) cha nkuchikaichila (kuti mwine nganichiwa Chakwe)
Aju (Muhammadi ﷺ) ni nkutetela jumpepe mwa akutetela wandanda
Chikusejelela chakusejelela (Kiyama jikuwandichila)
Pangali jwampaka achiunukule (kuti chimanyiche ndema jakwe jakwichila) jwangawaga Allah
Ana jenumanja nkujisimonga aji abaliji (Qur’an)
Ni nkuseka (mwachipongwe) ni ngalilaga (pati nchipikanaga yogoyo ya Allah)
Ni n’gamba kwanjila pe
Basi munsujudilaani Allah ni mun’galagatileje (Jwele Jikape)
Ndawi (jakwichila Kiyama) jiwandichile, ni ugaanjiiche mwesi
Soni naga ali achiweni chisimosimo akasanyosyaga, ni akutiji: “(Awu ni) usawi wakwendelechela.”
Ni waakaaniile, ni kuya isako yao, sano chindu chilichose (chambone kapena chakusakala chawapanganyisye mundu) chiwele chakutamilichika (malipilo gakwe lisiku lya Kiyama)
Soni chisimu chene pamasile pasyaayiiche wanganyao ngani (mu aji Qur’an) syasikwete nkati mwakwe ikaanyo yaukali (yakwakanya kutenda yakusakala)
(Aji Qur’an jiwele jegumbale) lunda lwakusokoka nnope, nambo itetelo ya akutetela nganiyiwa ikamuchisye (kwa wandu waajitundumalile)
Basi mwalekani. (Mwakumbusyani) lisiku lyatachiwilanga nkuwilanga (Israfil) ku chindu chakunyalaya kusyene (chiwalanjilo cha pa Kiyama)
Gali gatetewele meso gao, achikopokanganaga m’malembe, nti chisawu wanganyao sombe syakubalalikangana
Achikangamalaga (aku ali anyakwile ngosi, mwanja) wa kwankuwilanga. Achimakafili tachiti: “Ali ni lisiku lyakusausya kusyene.”
Waakaaniile paujo pao (Makuraishi nkanigaiche) wandu wa Nuhu, basi wansisisye kapolo Jwetu (Nuhu), ni watite: “Jwalakweju jwamasoka.” Ni jwakalipilidwe (ni kogoyesyedwa)
Basi jwaawendile Ambujegwe (Allah juchitiji): “Chisimu une ngomboleedwe, basi njokolaani.”
Basi ni twawugwile milango ja kwinani ni mesi gakusuka kwanneso
Ni twaliganjile litaka ni achitutumule, ni gasimene mesi (gakuuma kwinani ni gakopoka pasi) pa chindu chachaliji chepanjepanje (chigumula chakwajonanjila wandu wa Nuhu)
Ni twan’jigele (Nuhujo) pa chombo chamatabwa chachakomedwe ni misomali (jaitela)
Chaliji nkwenda (mwakuloleledwa) ni meso Getu, kuwa malipilo kwa ajula juwaliji ali akaniliidwe (Nuhu)
Soni chisimu twachilesile (chombocho) kuwa chilosyo, ana pana waachikumbuchila (ni kuliwunda nacho)
Ana ilagasyo Yangu yaliji uli kwisa soni itetelo Yangu
Soni chisimu chene tujijepepesye Qur’an kuti jiwe chikumbusyo, ana pana waajikumbuchila (nikuliwunda najo)
Achina Adi (nombe) waakaaniile. Ana ilagasyo Yangu yaliji uli kwisa soni itetelo Yangu
Chisimu Uwwe twatumichisye mbungo jakusisima nnope mu lisiku lyachitapani chakwendelechela
Jaliji nkwachuwa wandu (kuja nao mwinani, kaneka nikwagwichisya pasi mwakwapitikusya) nti chisawu wanganyao mapata ga itela ya tende yechuwidwe
Ana ilagasyo Yangu yaliji uli kwisa soni itetelo Yangu
Soni chisimu chene tujijepepesye Qur’an kuti jiwe chikumbusyo, ana pana waajikumbuchila (nikuliwunda najo)
Achina Samuda waakaaniile akutetela
Ni watite: “Ana mundu jwakuumila mwetuwe jumpepe ni tunkuyeje? Chisimu uwwe pa jele ndemajo chituwe mu kupotela ni masoka.”
“Ana chikumbusyo chipelecheedwe kukwakwe (Swaleh jikape) sikati jetu? (Ngwamba), nambo jwalakwe ni jwaunami kusyene, (soni) jwakulikulungusya.”
Tachimanyilila malawi kuti ana nduni jwali jwaunami kusyene, (soni) jwakulikulungusya
(Twansalile Swaleh kuti): “Chisimu Uwwe tukutumisya ngamiya jekongwe kuwa mayeso kukwao, basi mwajembechelani ni mpilile.”
“Ni mwatagulile yanti mesi gagawiidwe sikati jao (ni ngamiya, lisiku amweje wandu, lisiku line jimweje ngamiya), kumwa kulikose akuwichilileje (jwakukum’bandika).”
Nambo wam’bilasile n’jao (Qudar bin Salif juwaliji jwakusakalilwa nnope) ni jwajigele (upanga) ni jwajiuleje (ngamiya jila)
Ana ilagasyo Yangu yaliji uli kwisa soni itetelo Yangu
Chisimu Uwwe twatumichisye wanganyao n’gumilo umpepe, basi niwaliji nti chisawu mbelenje sya nkutawa lichinga (ni gumuka nikupondedwapondedwa)
Soni chisimu chene tujijepepesye Qur’an kuti jiwe chikumbusyo, ana pana waajikumbuchila (nikuliwunda najo)
Wandu wa Lutwi waakaaniile akutetela
Chisimu Uwwe twatumichisye chimbunga cha sakalawe (syasyajonasile wosope wene), ikaweje waliwasa lya Lutwi, twajokwele kumasikusiku
Kuwa ukoto wakuuma Kukwetu, iyyoyopeyo niyatukutiji pakun’dipila jwaatogolele
Soni chisimu jwalakwe (Lutwi) jwaatetele wanganyao ilagasyo Yetu, nambo waikaichile itetelo
Soni chisimu wannyenjelele (Lutwi kuti wape) achalendo wakwe (atende nao matanyula), basi ni twatatalesye meso gao, (ni twasalile kuti): “Pasyani ilagasyo Yangu ni itetelo Yangu.”
Ni yaalaawiile wanganyao kundawi ilagasyo yakutamilichika
(Twasalile kuti): “Pasyani ilagasyo Yangu ni itetelo Yangu.”
Soni chisimu chene tujijepepesye Qur’an kuti jiwe chikumbusyo, ana pana waajikumbuchila (nikuliwunda najo)
Soni chisimu chene wandu wa Firiauna yaichilile itetelo
Waakaaniile ilosyo Yetu yosopeyene (nsano nancheche), basi nitwaakwembekeenye kakwembekanye ka Jwamachili gakupunda, Jwakombola (chilichose)

Ana makafili genu (jenumanja Makuraishi) ni gagali gambone kwapunda wanganyao (wawajonanjidwe kala, mwanti jenumanja ni ngan’jonanjidwa), kapena nkwete chilanga chantunjelele (chachilembedwe) mu itabu (chanti ngasin’jonanjidwa)
Kapena akutiji: “Uwwe tuli likuga lyejinji mwanti mpaka tukombole kulichenjela (pangali jwampaka atukombole)
Lichikomboledwa likuga (lyaolyo), ni tachilosya migongo (kutila. Yatendekwe yalakweyi pangondo ja Badr)
Nambo Kiyama ni chilanga chao (chakwapela ilagasyo), soni Kiyama ni jamakungu gamakulungwa soni jakuwawa nnope

Jwalakwe ni Jwandanda (pangali chilichose paujo Pakwe), soni Jwambesi (pangali chilichose panyuma Pakwe), soni Jwapenani kusyene (pangali chilichose pachanya Pakwe), soni Jwakuwandika nnope (ni umanyilisyi Wakwe, pangali chakuwandika nnope kupunda Jwalakwe), soni Jwalakwe chindu chilichose juwele Jwaachimanya chenene

Jwalakwe ni Ajula juwagumbile mawunde ni mataka m’mowa nsano nalimo, kaneka ni jwatenjele pa Arishi (Chindanda Chaulungu). Jukuimanyilila yaikwinjila mwitaka, ni yaikopoka mwalakwemo, ni yaikutuluka kuumila kwinani, ni yaikwela kwalakweko, soni Jwalakwe juli pampepe ni jenumanja (ni umanyilisyi Wakwe) palipose pan’di, soni Allah ichindu yankutenda juwele Jwakuilolechesya
Uwele Wakwe uchimwene wa kumawunde ni petaka, soni kwa Allah ni kwakuuchisyidwa ichindu yosope

Akasachijinjisyaga chilo m’muusi (ni kuleupa muusi kwipipa chilo mpela ndawi jachitukuta), ni akwinjisyaga soni muusi m’chilo (ni kuleupa chilo kwipipa muusi mpela ndawi jakusisima), soni Jwalakwe ni Nkumanyilila chenene yaili m’mitima

Munkulupililani Allah ni Ntenga Jwakwe ﷺ, ni ntoleje mu ayila (ipanje) yantesile jenumanja kuwa wakuipochelangana (wane kuumila kwa wane), basi awala waakulupilile mwa jenumanja, ni kutola (ipanje yao), akwete kupata malipilo gamakulungwa

Chipali chichi kukwenu chikuntendekasya kuti nkankulupilila Allah, kutendaga Ntenga (Muhammadi ﷺ) akum’bilanga kuti munkulupilile M’mbuje gwenu, soni (Allah) pamasile paajigele chilanga chenu? Nam’baga jenumanja wanti nikulupilila (basi kulupililani)

Jwalakwe ni Ajula jwaakuntuluchisya kapolo Jwakwe (Muhammadi ﷺ) ma Aya gakusalichisya, kuti ankoposye m’chipi (chaukafili) ni kun’jinjisya mu lilanguka (lya Usilamu), soni chisimu Allah kukwenu ni Mpole kusyene, Jwachanasa channope

Soni chipali chichi kukwenu chikuntendekasya kuti nkatola petala lya Allah, kutendaga Allah ni Nsyene yakulechedwa (yosope) ya kumawunde ni petaka? Nganawa alandene mwa jenumanja awala wawatosile nkanikuwe kuwugula (Maaka) ni kuputa ngondo, wanganyao niwaakwete uchimbichimbi wekulungwa nnope ngalandana ni awala watosile panyuma (pakuwugula Maaka) ni kuputa ngondo, nambo wosope weneo Allah waapele chilanga cha umbone, soni Allah abali syosope sya yankutenda awele Jwaasimanya chenene

Ana ni nduni jwatankongosye Allah ngongole jambone (pakupeleka chipanje chakwe petala lya Allah) kuti ajijonjechesye kwa jwalakwejo (ni yakonjechesya yejinji, pakun’jonjechesya chipanje chakwe pa duniya pano)? Ni jukwete kupata soni jwalakwejo malipilo gakuchimbichika (ku Akhera)

Lisiku litinchaona wakulupilila wachilume ni wakulupilila wachikongwe lilanguka lyao linankwenda paujo pao ni kunkono wao wan’dyo, (achisalilidwaga yanti): “Kusengwa kwenu lelo! (Nikugajinjila) Matimbe ga ku Mbepo, gasikujilima chapasi pakwe sulo! Tim’be wandamo mwalakwemo! Kwalakweko ni kupunda kwekulungwa nnope!”

Lisiku lyatachiwecheta achinakunaku wachilume ni achinakunaku wachikongwe kwasalila awala wawakulupilile: “Tulindani kuti tupale nao lilanguka lyenulyo.” Kuchiwechetedwa (kukwao mwachipongwe): “Ujilaani munyuma mwenu, ni nkasosesose lilanguka.” Basi ni uchiwichidwa sikati jao uwigo wana nnango, nkati mwakwe (upande wa wakulupilila) muchiwa mwana chanasa, nambo kusa kwakwe cha upande wakwe (wa achinakunaku) kuchiwa kwana ipotesi

(Achinakunaku) tachawilanga wanganyao (wakulupilila), (achitiji): “Ana nganituwaga imo ni jenumanja (ku duniya pakutenda ibada)?” (Wakulupilila) takajile: “Elo (mwawaga nowe pachanyape), nambo jenumanja mwalijonasile mwachimisyene (ni unakunaku), ni mwajembechele (kuti yapate ipato Asilamu), ni mwakayichile (ya kwimuka m’malembe), ni yannyenjile isako yenu yaunami mpaka chayiiche chilamusi cha Allah (chiwa), ni wannyenjile jenumanja pa ya Allah nkunyenga (Ibulisu).”
“Basi lelo ngachipocheledwa chaaliwombolela kuumila kukwenu namuno kwa awala wawakufuulu, mauto genu ni ku Moto, gele ni malo genu gakum’bajila, kaje kusakala malo gakuwujila gakwe!”

Ana nganijikwane ndawi kwa awala waakulupilile janti mitima jao jitetewaleje pa kunkumbuchila Allah, ni (pakuipikana) ayila yakuona yaitulwiche (Qur’an). Soni ngasawa nti chisawu awala wawapedwile Chitabu kalakala (Ayuda ni Akilisito), basi jalewipe kukwao ndawi (jakulekangana ni achimitume wao), ni jajumwile mitima jao, soni wajinji mwa wanganyao wakunyosya
Manyililani yanti Allah akulisyusyaga litaka panyuma pakuwa kwakwe, chisimu chene tunsalichisye jenumanja ilosyo (ya ukombosi Wetu) kuti nkole lunda

Chisimu akutola sadaka wachilume ni akutola sadaka wachikongwe, ni kunkongosyaga Allah ngongole jambone (pakupeleka chipanje chao petala lya Allah), tiyijonjechesyedwe kukwao (ipanje yao pa duniya pano), ni akwete kupata soni wanganyao malipilo gakuchimbichika (ku Akhera)

Sano awala wankulupilile Allah ni Achimitenga Wakwe, wanganyao kwa M’mbuje gwao ni (waakuwalanjidwa kuti) wakulungamika kusyene (pachikulupi) soni wakuwila pa ngondo (jakumenyana ni makafili), akwete kupata wanganyao malipilo gao ni lilanguka lyao. Nambo awala waakufuulu ni kanila ma Aya Getu wanganyao niwandu wa ku Moto Waukali

Manyililani yanti umi wa duniya uwele wamasanje ni wangali mate, nambo soni chipeto, ni kupoochesyaana sikati jenu, ni kutupiya kusonganganya chipanje ni wanache. Ili chisawu wula jaukunsengwasyaga nnamalima mmela wakwe, kaneka ni kumula ni nkuuwonaga uli wam’bilichila, kaneka ni ukasawaga wakuteketuka (wangali chilichose). Sano ku Akhera tikukawe kwana ilagasyo yaukali nnope (kwa achimakafili), nambo soni chikululuko chakuumila kwa Allah ni chinonyelo (kwa wakulupilila). Ni nganiuwa umi wa duniya ikaweje chisengwasyo chakunyenga

Kangamalani wa ku chikululuko chakuumila kwa M’mbuje gwenu (Allah), ni Mbepo kusapanguka kwakwe kuli mpela kusapanguka kwa kwinani ni pasi, jiwichidwe tayali kwa awala wankulupilile Allah ni Achimetenga Wakwe. Walakweo ni ukoto wa Allah waakumpaga jwansachile, soni Allah ni Nsyene ukoto wekulungwa nnope
Nganichipatikaneje chipato petaka, namuno mu mwachimisyene, ikaweje (chalembedwe) m’Chitabu (cha Al-Lauh Al-Mahfuz) nkanituchiguumbe, chisimu yalakweyo kwa Allah iwele yakwepepala kusyene
Kuti nkadandaula pa yaimpiite, nambo soni nkatwanga pa yampeele, soni Allah wangannonyela jwakulikwesya jwalijose jwakuliiti
Awala waakutenda ubayili, ni kwachisyaga wandu kutenda ubayili. Sano jwatagalauche (kuleka yalamulidwe), basi (niyakwe), chisimu Allah ni Jwakupata kwejinji Jwakulapilidwa kusyesyene

Chisimu twaatumisye Achimitenga Wetu ni ilosyo yakuonechela, ni twatumisye pampepe ni wanganyao chitabu kwisa soni chilungamiko, kuti wandu ajime (pakutendelana ichindu yao) mwachilungamiko, ni tutulwisye chisyano, mwalakwemo mwana machili gamajinji (gakuputila ngondo), kwisa soni yakwakamuchisya wandu (yakulekangana-lekangana), soni kuti Allah ammanyukule mundu jwaakunkamuchisya Jwalakwe (paajikamuchisya dini Jakwe), ni (kwakamuchisya) Achimitenga Wakwe mwangali kum’bona (Allah jo). Chisimu Allah ni Jwakulimbangana nnope, Jwamachili gakupunda
Soni chisimu chene twantumisye Nuhu ni Ibrahima, ni twawisile mu wanache wao Utume ni Chitabu, basi wane mwa wanganyao waliji wakongoka, nambo wajinji mwa wanganyao waliji wakunyosya

Kaneko twakuyichisye mu sajo syao Achimitenga Wetu (wane), ni twakuyichisye soni ni Isa mwanache jwa Maryam, ni twampele Injil, ni twawisile m’mitima mwa awala wawankuyiye upole ni chanasa. Sano ungalombela wautandisye achimisyene, Uwwe nganitwalamulila yele. (Achimisyene ni wawaitandisye yalakweyo) pakusachilila chinonyelo cha Allah, ni nganaugosa (ungalombelao) kaugose kakwe kasyesyene. Basi ni twapele awala wawakulupilile (Allah ni Achimitenga Wakwe) mwa wanganyao malipilo gao, nambo wajinji mwa wanganyao ali wakunyosya

E jenumanja wankulupilile! Mun’jogopani Allah, ni munkulupilile Ntenga Jwakwe (Muhammadi ﷺ), tampe mitambala jiwili ja chanasa Chakwe, ni tam’bichile lilanguka lyatin’jendeje nalyo, soni tankululuchile, sano Allah ni Jwakululuka kusyene, Jwachanasa channope

Kuti wandu wawapedwile Chitabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito wangaakunkulupilila Muhammadi ﷺ) amanyilile yanti wanganyao nganakola ukombosi uliose pa ukoto wa Allah, ni kuti ukoto (wosope) uli m’makono mwa Allah akumpaga jwaakunsaka, soni Allah ni Nsyene ukoto wekulungwa nnope
